synopsis.text: Zoe, Max, and Rex, still adjusting to life without their dinosaur companions, are thrust into a new adventure when a time-warping portal opens, forcing them to team up with their old friends to restore the natural flow of time. Meanwhile, the Alpha Gang and the Ancients make a comeback, with the parents of our heroes being abducted by Gunenco, an underling of the Zanjark Space Aliens. In an unexpected turn of events, the Alpha Gang and the D-Team unite against their common enemy, the Zanjark, who are scheming to acquire the powerful Cosmos Stones. Seth, once a familiar face, reemerges as an ally to the Zanjark, with their leader, Jark, distributing the coveted dinosaur cards.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
